title: Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle with Straw for Sports and Travel, BPA-Free, 32oz, Dreamy Field
descriptions: Introducing the Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle with Straw for Sports and Travel. This 32oz bottle is perfect for staying hydrated on-the-go. The patented FreeSip spout allows for both sipping upright through the built-in straw or tilting back to drink from the spout opening. The push-button lid with lock keeps the spout clean and secure, while the convenient carry loop doubles as a lock. With double-wall insulation, this bottle keeps your drinks cold for up to 24 hours. The wide opening makes it easy to clean and add ice. Made from BPA and phthalate-free materials, the Owala FreeSip Water Bottle is both safe and durable. Choose from a variety of vibrant colors. Stay hydrated and stylish with the Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle.

The wide opening makes it easy to clean and add ice. Made from BPA and phthalate-free materials, the cup is hand washable and the lid is dishwasher safe. Title: Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle with Straw for Sports and Travel, BPA-Free, 32oz, Dreamy Field

Description: 32-ounce insulated stainless-steel water bottle with a FreeSip spout and push-button lid with lock

Patented FreeSip spout designed for either sipping upright through the built-in straw or tilting back to swig from the spout opening

Protective push-to-open lid keeps spout clean; convenient carry loop doubles as a lock

Double-wall insulation keeps drinks cold for up to 24 hours; wide opening for cleaning and adding ice

BPA and phthalate-free; hand wash cup, dishwasher-safe lid; not for use with hot liquids

The Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless-Steel Water Bottle with Locking Push-Button Lid easily tackles every thirst. With a built-in, easy-clean straw and a wide-mouth opening, the FreeSip reusable bottle is designed for drinking two different ways: sipping upright through the straw or tilting back to swig from the wide-mouth spout opening. Add in a push-to-open lid and playful colors, and staying hydrated has never been simpler—or more fun. Additional features include double-wall insulated stainless steel that keeps drinks cold up to 24 hours, a carry loop that doubles as a lock, and a wide opening for easy cleaning and adding ice. The Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless-Steel Water Bottle with Locking Push-Button Lid is available in three sizes: 24-Ounce, 32-Ounce, and 40-Ounce. Lid is dishwasher safe; hand wash cup. Not for use with hot liquids. Manufacturer’s limited lifetime warranty.
